title: Bring back Solo Queue
body: Dynamic queue sucks for anyone not playing with a lot of friends bring back solo queue for all of us who want to play on our own stop pushing us to have to have friends to win

replies.body: Dynamic Q is a colossal pile of shit
i love being the fill in a 4 man que and constantly getting 4-5 man ganked or invaded because the other 4 players dont care about you at all.

Play support. Honestly, you dodge pretty much every 4-man premade out there since they prefer to pick up the botlane roles themselves (communication supposedly op).

Of course, if you're the unlucky lamb and get placed with them anyway there's no saving you! x)

Cool, so I have the choice between...

* being reduced to filling material for premades

* being reduced to play only one role

No, thanks.
Overwatch launches tonight.

It's stupid alright, but I've found support to be the least hit by the premade trouble overall.

Wish I had the opportunity to play it, but with the laptop I have it's not likely to happen any time soon... :/

Another reason why Dynamic Queue is crap

http://euw.op.gg/summoner/userName=fncsp1rit

Literally Fnatic Spirit winning with Jungle Lulu, and pre-made with all the FNC team. Didn't lost once with Lulu jungle.

Silence isn't the same as ignoring.

It's a purposeful silence. They don't want to admit guilt by acknowledging what they have all but come out and said, which is that this game is being altered/undermined  to attempt a more "casual" and social appeal and younger demographic.

They need the game to appear competitive while feeling "fun" and exciting to play, even if that means they remove the actual fun and exciting parts.
they removed so much fun only the salt remains, i quitted.

Its pretty amazing how threads about dynamic shit appears every day and all of them gets upvoted at least to reach top once.
AND ITS EVEN MORE AMAZING.. PATHETIC THAT RIOT IGNORES THEM ALL.
Probably most discussed topic of the seasson.. hell, even of LoL existence.
Please bring it back. #Makesoloqueuegreatagain

I thought I knew troll hell. Nothing compares to having a 60%+ win rate in the last 20 games and hard climbing (meaning you've not yet reached your true ELO) just to get matched with a 4 man premade of guys who are all silver, 50% win rate, and 100 games+ deep (meaning they are definitely at their ELO).

My only priority in these situations is to make sure I don't get 4 man reported and move on... #feelsbadman
What if we all decided to play solo and made our own solo queue?
Nope, there won't be SoloQ, at least not this season. I already lost hope. I wonder how many victorious skins will be given to all those dynamic boosted.
I can't disagree.
{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}
I have no friends, I still play dynamic Q.

pretty sure a red commented on reddit saying no solo que coming back. They use the server space for our weekend rotations. https://www.reddit.com/r/leagueoflegends/comments/4dwkar/official_riot_temporarily_put_a_hold_on_solo/
yea gotta say i didnt support the claims that soloque was pretty much hell but now..... ugh this is just painful. oh well still off to try to climb (lose elo) {{sticker:zombie-brand-clap}}
Stop trying, Riot isn't bringing it back. No matter how much you whine. Just face it {{item:3070}}

the best thing you can do in DQ right now is take both carry roles. you can assure 1 position with overlap and maybe swing both. 

if you do that you are assured you are the only duo on your team, and then the enemy team also has 1, maybe 2 duos. 
but its fine, because no one else on your team will drag you down, they will be average and you can carry average.
I love Dynamic Q, I'm a loner too!!!
